snippet: A minor Shakespearean character comes to the fore in Tim Crouch’s “I, Malvolio,” at the Duke on 42nd Street.
abstract: Tim Crouch’s acclaimed one-man show I, Malvolio explores world of manservant Malvolio from Shakespeare's Twelfth Night; show is Crouch's latest work that seeks to introduce Shakespeare to young people by spotlighting minor Shakespearean characters and refracting themes from the plays through their eyes.
lead_paragraph: A minor Shakespearean character comes to the fore in Tim Crouch’s “I, Malvolio,” at the Duke on 42nd Street.

headline.seo: Tim Crouch on ‘I, Malvolio,’ His One-Man Show at the Duke
headline.main: ‘Twelfth Night’ Twit Gets a Turn in the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: ‘Twelfth Night’ Twit Gets a Turn In the Spotlight
